about:
A mechanical engineer who has a passion for full-stack, 3d modeling, cgi animation, and data science.


Experienced mechanical engineering graduate with a strong technical foundation in design, analysis, and project management. Skilled in cloud platforms, business intelligence tools, data analytics, and full-stack development. Proven ability to innovate and collaborate on complex engineering projects, demonstrated through designing solar concentrators, generator rotor extractors, and enhancing vehicle fuel efficiency.
